suite.name: 01 Login Testes

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

test.name: Cenario: Realizar Login Com Sucesso Administrador

kw.name: Cadastrar Novo Usuario
kw.doc: Tipos de usuario Aceitos: - "Administrador" - "Nao Administrador"

kw.name: Criar Dados Usuario Valido Do Tipo
kw.doc: Aceita como argumento um tipo de usuário e retorna um usuário do tipo desejado Se não for passado um tipo de usuário, retorna um usuario Não Administrador Tipos de usuario Aceitos: - "Administrador" - "Nao Administrador"

kw.name: Name
kw.doc: :example 'John Doe'

kw.name: Word
kw.doc: Generate a word.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Password
kw.doc: Generate a random password of the specified ``length``.

kw.name: Set Variable If
kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '116', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"nome": "Loretta Patton", "email": "runmooresteven@example.org", "password": "u3UtJAk9__", "administrador": "true"}'

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Remove From Dictionary
kw.doc: Removes the given ``keys`` from the ``dictionary``.
